# xcpcio/board-spider

[![Test][test-ci-badge]][test-ci]
[![GitHub release][gh-release-badge]][gh-release]

## Development

```bash
# run test
poetry run pytest
poetry run pytest --snapshot-update

# release
poetry version patch
```
